item.title: Informs that self-guarantee financial assurance documents submitted 960325,reviewed & in compliance w/10CFR30 App C, "Criteria re Use of Financial Tests & Self-Guarantees for Providing Reasonable Assurance of Funds...."

item.title: Ack receipt of 960626 ltr re revised page 5-1 to Vallecitos Nuclear Ctr Physical Security Plan.Changes acceptable.

item.title: Ack receipt of 960425 ltr transmitting rev to GE-Vallecitos Nuclear Ctr Physical Security Plan for facility.Changes found to be consistent w/provisions of 10CFR50.54(p) & acceptable for inclusion into plan.

item.title: Forwards revised pages to radiological emergency plan, reflecting minor changes in organization clarification of designation of emergency operations coordinator & consolidation of communications at central alarm station.

item.title: Insp repts 50-018/96-01,50-070/96-01,50-073/96-01 & 50-183/96-01 on 960311-15.No violations noted.Major areas inspected:organization & mgt controls,qualifications & training,special nuclear matl & accountability & more.

item.title: Physical Security Insp Repts 50-070/81-01 & 50-073/81-73 on 810406-07.No noncompliance noted.Major areas inspected: security plan,protection of SNM,security organization,access control,alarm sys & keys.Portions deleted.
